messages.zh: 走廊好黑！而且好挤！
messages.en: It’s so dark and crowded!

messages.zh: 不、不好意思，虽然方便藏身，可毕竟这里只是个小阁楼而已！
messages.en: I-I apologize. While it is a convenient hiding place, it’s just a small attic after all!

messages.zh: 磨坊，粮仓，电房，村子里的很多设施都被赏金猎人破坏了，他们不会在乎这种小地方的。
messages.en: With the mills, granaries, electricity houses and many of the village's amenities destroyed by the bounty hunters. They won’t expect a small place like this.

messages.zh: 是这样没错......唔，我们两个居然刚好能挤进这种缝隙里？！
messages.en: While you are right... about finding a place like this to hide. I’m just wondering how the two of us could fit in this gap!?

messages.zh: 可萝尔，脸是不是贴的太近了！
messages.en: Hey Carol, your face is too close to mine!

messages.zh: 抱歉......那个，骑警大人？
messages.en: I'm sorry erm… Sir Grani.

messages.zh: 别叫我骑警大人啦，叫我格拉尼就好。
messages.en: Don’t call me Sir Grani, just call me Grani.

messages.zh: 那，格拉尼，你刚才说你接到了我们村子希望找到骑士宝藏的委托......
messages.en: So… Grani, you said that you'd accepted our village's request to find the knight's treasure.

messages.zh: 对，而且委托里还提到，你确实已经拥有完整的宝藏信息了？
messages.en: Correct, the request also states that you have full information about the knights treasure?

messages.zh: 打开宝藏必要的钥匙和宝藏的位置，都是历代村长口口相传的秘密。
messages.en: The key and location of the treasure are secrets passed down for generations from village chief to village chief.

messages.zh: 具体的我暂时还不能说......抱歉，我不是有意要向你隐瞒。
messages.en: I can't say the exact details yet... I'm sorry. I have no intention to hide it from you.

messages.zh: 没问题的，至少等到你完全相信我之后再说吧。
messages.en: It’s all right. At the very least you can tell me more once you fully trust me.

messages.zh: 那些赏金猎人得知了这些情报，就一直在威胁着村民们。
messages.en: The bounty hunters knew about it and kept threatening the villagers.

messages.zh: 他们破坏村子的田地，抢走越冬的储粮，骚扰村民——如果那时我不站出来，村子就真的要完了。
messages.en: They destroyed the village fields, rob us of our winter stores, and even harassed some of the villagers -- if I didn't come forward then, the village was going to be finished.

messages.zh: 只要让他们知道宝藏的情报在我这里，至少他们不再去伤害其他村民们了。
messages.en: As long as they knew that information about the treasure is in my possession, at least they won't hurt the other villagers anymore.

messages.zh: 但就算你受了那样的苦......
messages.en: But even if you had suffered...

messages.zh: ......嗯，我很清楚，这不过是权宜之计。
messages.en: Yeah... I know very well that it was only a temporary measure.

messages.zh: 还好，你来了。
messages.en: I'm glad you're here now.

messages.zh: 呜，可萝尔小姐......
messages.en: Miss Carol...

messages.zh: 虽然委托内容是希望有人能来帮我们找到宝藏，
messages.en: While the request did state we were hoping someone would help us find the treasure.

messages.zh: 但其实我们希望的也只是驱逐那些赏金猎人、让村子恢复安宁。
messages.en: What we really want is help in driving out the bounty hunters and restoring peace to the village.

messages.zh: 宝藏对我们来说，是现在唯一的解决手段而已。
messages.en: The treasure is the only solution we have left now.

messages.zh: 金币什么的，总会有花光的一天，但我们一直要在这片土地上生活下去，土地是我们唯一的故乡......
messages.en: Gold coins whatever… it will all run out someday, but we will always have this land to live in, this land is our only home.

messages.zh: 用宝藏去雇佣别人驱逐赏金猎人，也可以。
messages.en: Not a bad idea to use the treasure to hire someone in driving out the bounty hunters for you.

messages.zh: 有足够的活动资金的话，甚至能雇佣一小支佣军呢！
messages.en: With enough money to go around, you can even hire a small army!

messages.zh: 嗯。
messages.en: Correct.

messages.zh: 既然目的已经明确，那当务之急，果然还是要先离开这个满是流氓的村子。
messages.en: Now that the objective is clear, it is now imperative for us to leave the village full of bounty hunters first.

messages.zh: 这边有窗子，能看到外——呃，好像有点高。
messages.en: There's a window here, which you can see out -- well, it's a little high.

messages.zh: 可萝尔小姐，你能试试从这个窗户看到外面吗，赏金猎人还在找我们吗？
messages.en: Miss Carol, can you try and see out of this window? Are the bounty hunters still looking for us?

messages.zh: 我，我也够不到，窗户还是太高了......
messages.en: I-I can't reach it. The window is too high.

messages.zh: 让我抱你起来......
messages.en: Let me hold you up.

messages.zh: 嘿！现在能看到了吗？
messages.en: Here! Can you see outside now?

messages.zh: 好的，我能看到了————
messages.en: Ok, I can see --
What?!

messages.zh: 可萝尔小姐！别乱动呀！
messages.en: Miss Carol! Stop moving so much!

messages.zh: 可、可那个，那是什么呀......
messages.en: But, but, what was that...

messages.zh: 刚才，有个人，从窗户外飞了过去......?
messages.en: Just now, someone, pass by the window...?
